title: La Pomme d'Api
description: A grocery store with a lot of healthy, fresh, bio, eco-friendly and natural products. Carries a large selection of vegan products and specialties like yogurt, ice cream, sour cream, cheese and faux meat. Also has a few vegan and vegetarian prepared meals. Stocks bulk items like beans, rice, spices, flour and more. Promotes a vegan lifestyle on their Facebook page. Has been reported If they sell dairy and meat it's in things like yogurt and frozen meals.
